name: Copyright Footer
author: William Bay

sections.description:
This is a Full Site Editing Footer block.

Adds a footer area with a Copyright date that updates every year automatically, with some additional options.

To be used as a block in the Footer Template Part with full site editing.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use this as a regular block in content?

No, this is meant to be used as a Template Part in themes that support full site editing.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Changed the Copyright date to a range from oldest known year of website to current year.

0.1.0

  • Release

short_description: This is a Full Site Editing Footer block.
description:
This is a Full Site Editing Footer block.

Adds a footer area with a Copyright date that updates every year automatically, with some additional options.

To be used as a block in the Footer Template Part with full site editing.

screenshots.caption: Use this block in the Footer Template Part.
Copyright year, and Site Name are enabled by default.
You can optionally enable a text area that allows you to display legal links like Privacy Policy or Terms of Use pages.
You can modify the colors of Text, Links and Background.
